name: The Far Kingdoms: Sacred Grove Solitaire
description: In a magical land far away, there is a beautiful island inhabited by elves. A sacred grove has granted these elves powerful magic but one day everything changed. A powerful earthquake has destroyed the island along with the sacred grove. The Elven Queen seeks your help to restore the island.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
